DOC.brief_summary: The investigator aim evaluate feasibility large clinical trial assess exercise program `` teachable moment '' patient prostate cancer measure effect tumor apoptosis signaling , lipogenesis steroidogenesis . Participants randomize 4-12 week exercise program standard care . Participants assess screening , baseline ( day 0 ) , throughout trial intervention ( day 1-84 ) , post-intervention visit ( prior radical prostatectomy ) final study visit 6-months post-radical prostatectomy . At assessment , physical , biological sample psychosocial assessment take place .
DOC.brief_title: Feasibility Measuring Exercise 's Effects Molecular Mechanisms Disease Progression Prostate Cancer
DOC.criteria: Inclusion criterion : Completed PreScreening Consent Form Men CaP , deem suitable urologist RP Engaging < 90 minutes/week moderatetovigorous exercise BMI < 40 Age > 19 Able speak read English ( able complete questionnaire ) Willing comply study procedure ( include commit twiceweekly visit study exercise facility exercise home ) available duration study Provide sign date informed consent form â€¢ Men medical , musculoskeletal condition use mobility aid prevents participation exercise intervention .
